content: Looking for help in how to export messages from individuals if ever the need arises to satisfy either a legal requirement or a HR complaint. Have access to the database if needs be. Just not exactly an expert at Postgres (Know just enough to be very dangerous).
@Roy Kerns there's several ways to do it. The simplest is to have the user use https://zulipchat.com/api/get-messages.
Thanks, We will test this out. :thumbs_up:

@Tim Abbott Using that API, looks like we need the users API key to be able to search their messages (Unless were using it wrong). Is there another way to pull their messages from Zulip or the Postgresql DB? Thanks for any info or help you can provide.
@Roy Kerns well, you can get their API get via get_user_profile_by_email("user@example.com").api_key on a manage.py shell. It's also possible to use ./manage.py export_single_user
@Tim Abbott Thanks, That produced an output that we can live with for now. your help is greatly appreciated
